Sentencas: As a device for direct conversion of chemical energy into electrical energy, the solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) contributes positively to the sustainable development strategy.
Titulo: Improved Durability of High-Performance Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with a Ba-Doped La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-d Cathode

Sentencas: However, the commercialization of fuel cells is still impeded by severe cathode degradation caused by its limited stability at operating temperatures and being prone to Cr-poisoning from Cr-containing alloy interconnectors commonly used in these cells.
Titulo: Improved Durability of High-Performance Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with a Ba-Doped La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-d Cathode

Sentencas: In contrast, for the undoped LSCF under the same testing conditions, the polarization resistance of the cell increases & SIM;10 times from 0.22 omega cm2 of the pristine cell to 2.18 omega cm2 after Cr-exposure testing.

Sentencas: Furthermore, when tested in an anode-supported complete cell as a cathode under typical SOFC operation conditions at 750 & DEG;C, the cell with the Ba-doped LSCF cathode displays significantly low degradation rates of 0.00056% h-1 (without Cr) and 0.00310% h-1 (with Cr); both are much lower than that of the cell using the undoped LSCF cathode (0.00124% h-1 without Cr and 0.01082% h-1 with Cr).
Titulo: Improved Durability of High-Performance Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with a Ba-Doped La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-d Cathode

Sentencas: This enhanced durability and Cr-tolerance exhibited by the Ba-doped LSCF cathode stem from its higher crystal structure stability and improved chemical resistance compared to undoped LSCF.
Titulo: Improved Durability of High-Performance Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with a Ba-Doped La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-d Cathode
